long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Found a binge-worthy show on Netflix, Amazon Prime Video, or Disney+ Hotstar? Reading an interesting blog? Browsing memes or skincare recommendations? 

Save to Openvy is the easiest way to save, track, or start a discussion about TV shows, movies, articles, blogs, and everything else on the internet.

→ Discuss the latest plot twists, cliffhangers, or spoilers
→ Share your favorite blogs, videos, or memes with friends
→ Keep track of must-watch shows, movies, and other helpful resources

Openvy is your place to engage with the community more humanely and bot-freely. You can have the world tune into opinions from your favorite places on the internet. Share top stories from The New York Times, personal musings from Tumblr, edgy Instagram memes, or Pinterest mood boards on Openvy. 

Here’s what you can do:

1. Share All That You Discover
When something catches your eye—be it a show, movie, meme, or article—click the Openvy extension icon in your browser toolbar.

2. Post Your Update
A quick pop-up will appear asking you to share the update. In case it’s a link, it will show you existing discussions on the subject.

3. Open Update Card
Open the update card for any movie or TV series you want to track or share.

4. Launch a Loop
Click on the “Launch Loop” option to track or share your experience.

5. Save for Later
If you want to revisit it later, hit “Save for Later” to add the update to your profile for future reference.

6. Mark as Watching
When you watch the movie or series, select “Mark as Watching.”

7. Mark as Watched
Once you’re done, select “Mark as Watched” to finish tracking and update your profile.

Got queries or feature requests? Reach out to us anytime at hello@openvy.com
